flow.descriptionCdata:
422f21e3-f2e8-4e93-b89a-c4a7ee92e08d.15fcd074-47ce-4093-9f2f-bfddd03174ca.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 422f21e3-f2e8-4e93-b89a-c4a7ee92e08d.517a3697-9fc3-449c-b746-e034f564a59f.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 422f21e3-f2e8-4e93-b89a-c4a7ee92e08d.5512a3ec-f206-4582-a50c-93d4e25d544d.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 422f21e3-f2e8-4e93-b89a-c4a7ee92e08d.9a64f788-7c1e-4735-bac0-982bf6e908f1.description=
This operation iterates through a list of values. It is not recommended to modify the value of the "list" and "separator" inputs during the iteration process.

Inputs\:
    list - The list to iterate through.
    separator - A delimiter separating the list elements.
Default value\: ‘,’ (comma) 

Results\:
    resultString - The current list element (if the response is "has more").

Responses\:
    has more - Another value was found in the list and it has been returned.
    no more - The iterator has gone through the entire list. This response is returned once per list iteration.  A subsequent call to the List iterator operation restarts the list iteration process.
    failure - The operation completed unsuccessfully.

Note\:
   The position of the iterator in the list is tracked by each step's unique identifier. Therefore, you can simultaneously iterate through the same list from multiple steps.
422f21e3-f2e8-4e93-b89a-c4a7ee92e08d.b25d52f5-1e80-4b51-b25f-56b156ec6918.description=Generic flow to send an e-mail 422f21e3-f2e8-4e93-b89a-c4a7ee92e08d.b3866e34-719e-48b8-b513-66bdbf7e7340.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 422f21e3-f2e8-4e93-b89a-c4a7ee92e08d.e0d35ac4-fd1e-4072-8548-6641d9add5a5.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 422f21e3-f2e8-4e93-b89a-c4a7ee92e08d.fa39ac80-63f4-47b2-a333-0c65e82f5558.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State
flow.name: pc_lc_unmark_cluster_for_delete

staticBinding.value:
The Server '${server.hostname}' is not marked for deletion anymore.
Please DO NOT ignore tickets regarding this server until further notice.

Best regards
Delivery Team

The Server '${server.hostname}' is not marked for deletion aynmore.
Please DO NOT ignore tickets regarding this server until further notice.

Best regards
Delivery Team
This cluster has been unmarked from Deletion.
